div.head: 牙齦疳臭
div.div: -illness with stench of teeth and gums

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: -illness with stench of teeth and gums

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with ya gan 牙疳 , dental gan -illness. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry wu pei zi 五 倍子 quotes Bin hu ji jian fang 瀕湖集簡方 : 牙齦疳臭：五倍子炒焦一兩，枯礬、銅青各一錢， 為末。先以米泔漱淨，摻之 , “ Gan -illness with stench of teeth and gums : Burned wu pei zi 1 liang ; ku fan and tong qing , 1 qian each. Powderize. First cleanse [the teeth] with the slop from washing rice. Then apply the [powder]”.
